name: PointAndShoot
description:
A fast DeathMatch multiplayer game

GameMode

Currently the only game mode is to shoot to the enemies and get the necessary points before the other team. 

Controls

Player one can play with keyboard, but other players do need a gamepad. However there is a issue only a gamepad conected to player Nº2 can control second character, if you only conect one gamepad it will control the first player.

Keyboards controls: WASD to move point and hold click with mouse to shoot

Gamepad controls: Left thumbstick to move, right thumbstick to shoot.
